ComicInfo.Summary:
Return to the world of Blade Runner in an all-new ongoing comic series from the pen of Michael Green (screenwriter for Blade Runner 2049) and Mike Johnson (Star Trek), illustrated by Andres Guinaldo (Justice League Dark, Captain America)! Veteran Blade Runner Ash hunts down the kidnapped child of a billionaire, but he's not all he seems...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Christian Ward | 1 | B | Cover B | Syd Mead | 2 | C | Cover C | Andres Guinaldo | 3 | D | Virgin Cover D | Christian Ward | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-11 19:54:05. [CVDB716865]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andres Guinaldo, Christian Ward, Syd Mead
ComicInfo.Genre: Post-Apocalyptic, Robots, Cyborgs & Mecha, Movies & TV, Action/Adventure, Fantasy, Science Fiction
ComicInfo.Characters: Alexander Selwyn, Cleo Selwyn, Detective Ash, Isobel Selwyn, Lydia Wojciech, Malak
